entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who is trying to resist Voldemort. (Excerpt: 'Harry saw small collections of lights as they passed over more villages...')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is yelling from behind him. (Excerpt: 'This is bizarre!' Harry heard Ron yell from somewhere behind him...)

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's friend and a wizard, who is lying on the Department of Mysteries floor. (Excerpt: 'How much time had elapsed since he had seen Sirius lying on the Department of Mysteries floor?')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, a dark wizard who is trying to control Harry. (Excerpt: 'How much longer would he be able to resist Voldemort?')

relationships.description: Harry has seen Sirius lying on the Department of Mysteries floor. (Excerpt: 'How much time had elapsed since he had seen Sirius lying on the Department of Mysteries floor?')
Harry is resisting Voldemort. (Excerpt: 'How much longer would he be able to resist Voldemort?')
